EmailTemplate.subject: Transforming inpatient care with a virtual solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly: INPATIENT CARE SOLUTION Virtual nursing: An opportunity to increase efficiency and improve the patient experience Record-high staffing shortages are putting healthcare workers’ well-being—and their patients’ health—at risk. With fully integrated telehealth capabilities in every patient room, virtual nursing solutions can help. The Inpatient Care Solution delivers value by: - Creating virtual clinical and administrative workflows that increase efficiencies - Boosting care team collaboration by connecting any care team member with their patient - Increasing patient satisfaction by connecting their care teams through a telehealth endpoint - Lowering costs, including those associated with readmissions and staff turnover About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
